department.name: Eidgenössisches Departement für Wirtschaft, Bildung und Forschung
Département fédéral de l'économie, de la formation et de la recherche
Dipartimento federale dell'economia, della formazione e della ricerca
Federal Department of Economic Affairs, Education and Research

content.title: Einladung zur Medienkonferenz
content.teaser: Information to the press: Update on the current WTO-Negotiations on Agriculture
content.lead: Information to the press: Update on the current WTO-Negotiations on Agriculture
content.text:
Dear Sir or Madam,

H.E. Mr. Luzius Wasescha, Head of the Swiss Delegation, has the pleasure to invite you to an update on the negotiations on agriculture currently in progress at the WTO.

The press conference will take place on

Friday, 03.06.2005,  09h00

Centre de Conférences de Varembé
Ground floor
Room B
9-11, rue de Varembé
1202 Geneva

For further information:
Didier Chambovey
Minister
Permanent Mission of Switzerland to WTO and EFTA
Tel. +41 (0)22 749 25 12
